message.body: Wanna come to Ithaca tonight or b4 u leave ny? Can crash at our place or on the boat if u can make it this eve. Good music playing downtown
We are making dinner for linda lovig right now at my parents, probably can't make it down there tonight but u are always welcome to stay here
We saw your dad and he looked good! We are leaving tomorrow around one but will be sure to make it back for the wedding!
